narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Easter Seals Southern California INC is a Behavior Analyst provider based in Irvine, CA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $49.4M in Medicaid payments across 684K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $49.4M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
